author: Reuters Editorial
title: Hungary Feb retail sales rise by 6.5 pct y/y -stats
text: BUDAPEST, April 5 (Reuters) - Hungary's calendar-adjusted retail sales rose by an annual 6.5 percent in February after a revised 7.8-percent increase in January, the Central Statistics Office (KSH) said on Thursday. Food sales grew by 3.8 percent, non-food sales were up by 8.5 percent, while fuel sales rose by 9.8 percent. Feb 2018 Jan 2018 Feb 2017 Jan-Feb 2018 6.5 7.8 3.2 7.1 (Reporting by Gergely Szakacs)
